snippet: Caitlin Ryan, a California social worker, developed a program that uses supportive meetings, videos, handbooks and research to help Mormon families accept their gay children.
abstract: Samuel G Freedman On Religion column; California social worker Caitlin Ryan has developed a program that uses supportive meetings, videos, handbooks and research to help Mormon families accept their gay children.
lead_paragraph: Caitlin Ryan, a California social worker, developed a program that uses supportive meetings, videos, handbooks and research to help Mormon families accept their gay children.

headline.print_headline: Social Worker Spreads a Message of Acceptance to Mormons With Gay Children
headline.main: Social Worker Spreads a Message of Acceptance to Mormons With Gay Children
